#summary How to compile the Gross-Pitaevskii solving module.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

This page describes how to compile the executable for solving the Gross-Pitaevskii equation using gcc 4.1.2 on linux.


= Details =

  # download the source using subversion as described on the  [http://code.google.com/p/fdtl/source/checkout Source Page]
  # change to the directory created in the step above
    * `cd fdtl` (`cd fdtl-read-only`, if downloading anonymously)
  # type `make mlt_gpe`
